title: To all the smokers out there...
body:
Please if you are a smoker please don't smoke when you load, or if you do please smoke at your desk so you can watch when you load in, it's becoming too frequent when players are afk due to smoking, the enemy team immediately has an advantage due to afk. The enemy can invade very easily, oftentimes picking up a kill because team wasn't there.

I've had games where people don't even come in until 3-5mins due to smoking, lane is lost, game is usually lost because of it.

Please smokers, have some respect for your team mates and smoke at your desk, if you're not allowed to then don't smoke at all, or get an E-cig.

Don't punish team mates because you can't control your cravings.
